=== About Me ===
I'm a 24 year old IT manager, I do a bit of everything, coding, packaging, documentation, managing, you name it.
Currently working a lot on edubuntu, and my own apps.  Also in the background working on Devenix, a complete web dev studio bootable off of a USB stick

=== Ubuntu Work ===
Still learning a lot about everything really, have been helping out with bug fixing, packaging, documentation, man pages, writing utility apps.  I love the Ubuntu community, such a friendly bunch of people, always willing to help out the n00bs.  Currently focusing more efforts on edubuntu as I work in a school it is of extreme interest to me.
Also worked(ing) on the following
* Interviewing Edubuntu Team on YouthLUG radio - coming soon
* Writing documentation for ltsp script man pages for edubuntu
* Testing latest releases of edubuntu
* Distribution of Ubuntu CD's at work and conversion of windows users to Ubuntu
* Review of the <nowiki>[[http://doc.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/packagingguide/C/index.html|Ubuntu Packaging Guide]]</nowiki> for the documenation team
* Creating Devenix - complete web dev studio bootable from usb stick eventually in ubuntu from knoppix
* Help maintaining wiki.edubuntu.org and www.edubuntu.org
* Created <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/products/gisomount|gisomount]]</nowiki> - An iso mounting utility gui for gnome
* Helping people on ubuntu-motu, and reviewing packages on REVU
* Working on <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/products/grasynco|grasynco]]</nowiki> - A front end gui app for ogra's rsyncer script
* Completed the <nowiki>[[StudentControlPanelCompletion]]</nowiki> - <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/products/student-control-panel|Package]]</nowiki>
* Patched Pessulus for SCP integration
* Working on <nowiki>[[StudentControlPanelSpec]]</nowiki> - <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/products/tcm|Package]]</nowiki>
* Created <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/products/gisomount|phimage]]</nowiki> - A photo viewer for opengl
* Sponsored representation at the <nowiki>[[http://bettshow.com|BETT]]</nowiki> (British Educational Technology Trade Show) 
* Created <nowiki>[[EdubuntuLeaflet]]</nowiki> for BETT
* Wrote the ESA, <nowiki>[[http://doc.ubuntu.com/edubuntu/school-advocacy/C/index.html|Edubuntu Schools Advocacy]]</nowiki>, which has been the root of many Edubuntu based leaflets and info docs
